storyInfo: The members of Penguin Logistics all team up and finally defeat the Rat King with the help of a sneak attack from Bison's butler. Bison chooses to sacrifice his life in order to defuse the bomb left behind by the Rat King, but a shocking truth awaits.

attributes.content: We're just... going to watch?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: We're just going to watch. But I have no idea what's happening.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: At least they're not hurting any civilians?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: And there's so much good food going to waste...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I hate to see it too. But I guess a street fight is just part of the party.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It was planned?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Doesn't look like it. Oh, someone's coming.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Agh...! I think... I hit the wrong person...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Isn't it kind of unsafe to stay here?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I could go back to the office, but what would I even do there?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Don't you have a test tomorrow? In the afternoon?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Those two seem as if they are uninvolved in this event.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: We should ask them to leave. We would not want them to get hurt.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...Hold on, isn't that man up there with his belly cut open the Emperor of Penguin Logistics?
He's dead. And you seem not at all bothered?
Bothered? Why?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Mr. Emperor gets himself into such trouble several times a month. We have grown accustomed to this behavior.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: His death?
Correct.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...Sounds like Mostima really shouldn't be getting close to you people.
You worry about her?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: I'm just here to make sure she doesn't do anything out of line.
But, hm, it's a really clumsy act. Since she looks so relaxed over there, I guess there isn't anything worth worrying about.
I'm going for a walk. Don't tell her I came. I'll go see her myself when things quiet down.
...There she goes.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: She shows up, asks her questions, and leaves just as suddenly as she appears.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Is this the way they do things in Laterano now?
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...Heh. I suddenly find myself envious of you young people.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You always choose your own paths, thinking only of yourselves. You don't consider your places in the grand scheme of things.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I also work hard.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But no one has ever been able to get to the bottom of you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If you ever really did, that would be the most frustrating of all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Indeed. There are some things that should not be so thoroughly investigated. Especially those things that have to do with Mostima the Messenger.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What is this? Occupational discrimination?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm only speaking from experience.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Let's take a break for a moment now.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: My Arts are suppressed...?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So you were the one holding back your strength all this time?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: As were you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But you have wasted enough time.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: This little punk, how can he keep fighting...? Grr...
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: *Pant pant* I can... keep going... all night...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Yep. You're doing great.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Good thing you were able to deal with so many bad guys so quickly.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey. We won't let you disappear on your own this time.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So this guy's the evil mastermind pulling the strings here? I definitely owe him a personal beating!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We got ourselves one helluva workout today. And the bill's gettin' mighty long too.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Texas, I'm thinkin' there's a lot we ain't gonna get to expense here tonight...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Don't ask me. That's a question for the boss.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But the boss is dead...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...Then it'll have to wait.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Speaking of, did anybody go deal with the boss's corpse? Leaving him up there to get trampled feels kind of...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: There we are. The players are assembled.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Young people always make their own choices.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Even if it means walking through a Catastrophe, leaving your bodies splattered and broken, you still proceed with such determination.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What is he talking about?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just a grandpa's muttering. Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Right then. Are you enjoying your Sauin?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: S'all right. Kinda like a hangover. No way I can think about what I gotta do tomorrow.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So... nobody's going to take care of the boss?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...Penguin Logistics, you truly are unfathomable.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I think we don't need to worry about that, considering.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's Penguin Logistics. The whole reason for this war was someone questioning the boss's tastes.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm sorry, what?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He gave his life to preserve his style. That's our Emperor.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But I must say, not one of you ever surprised me in the slightest.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Mmmff! What's this sand?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: He still has the strength?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yes... everybody focus. This fight is going to be different.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If you let your guard down for even a split second,
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You'll die.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sauin must be a lively event!
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Let me see with my own eyes the freaks that Emperor raised.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: My blade broke the moment it touched the sand... that's a problem.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Mmm. In all my years, those bold enough to approach me with blade or bullet were few and far between.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll give him one of these!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oof, no good! Croissant, you're up!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My hammer's already stuck in the quicksand! I can't move!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hopeless. Is this all you have, Penguin Logistics?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's not all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: His sand shield is broken. Now, Exusiai!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's barrage time!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How many guns do you have? Troublesome angel.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Don't even think about it!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh? I've been blocked?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Thanks, Bison!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm up! Sorry fer the elder abuse!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Aagh! Couldn't get him! Texas, yer up!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wishful thinking.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I got this, Texas!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hmm, a voice-based Originium Art. What an interesting little girl.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How's your spatial awareness?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He even dodged from that angle...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: At least you made him move. When he takes us on just standing in one place, I feel like he's looking down on us.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Oh, Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That coat was a gift from my daughter.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: In all these years, you are the first to even touch it.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How many young people like you are in Lungmen? What are you capable of, actually?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's enough to just be yourself, isn't it? Or are you upset?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No, I just find myself with some... complex feelings...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But it's getting terribly late now, so it's time I——
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Mmng?!
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: He- he's been shot?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's that sniper from before. He's still here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...Target down. Moving to confirm.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: What have you done?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Young Master, he was a threat.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: You should never have gone so close to him. He has an affinity for Originium Arts. I could not guarantee your safety.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: You must understand, the Young Master's safety is my number one priority.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...What you're saying is... I was bait?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: My father knew this would happen, so he sent you to...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Young Master.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Young Master, some things are not as they seem. You will come to understand in time. And I promise, the Master of the House had no intention of exploiting you at any time.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: And I believe Penguin Logistics will also be expecting an explanation. I must secure the Rat King's remains and confirm that he is deceased.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: It's fine. The boss is gone. There's no one to hear you explain.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thank you for your understanding. Now, Young Master, do take care.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Bison, now is not the time to dwell on this.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The Rat King promised us a 'gift', don't forget.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It might be a bomb. That Siracusan guy really liked bombs.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That wouldn't be very clever.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And there are still some enemies to worry about. It looks like they're waiting for us?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The Rat King is gone, and they don't seem to be reacting at all?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Right, no reaction whatsoever. Hm... I think I know what's happening...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Let's split up. Sora, Croissant, Exusiai, we'll take care of the remaining enemies.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Bison and Mostima, you deal with the 'gift.'
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's almost sunrise. We're running out of time.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Damn, where could it be...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're all flustered. Try not to be so emotional.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I did just find out that I was being kept in the dark about my whole purpose here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Mostima, did we actually, maybe meet the Rat King before?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We did.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So you had it all figured out from the beginning?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Ahahaha...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Don't try to wriggle out of this one!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm. I couldn't have guessed what he was really up to.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But we really don't have much time. The LGD aren't going to sit on their hands.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: As crazy as things have gotten around here, with them jumping in, there's no way we'd work it out.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Victorian gumdrops, the candy box, maybe that was a clue.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But it's just common sense that using the same kind of trap over again would be really dumb.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Yeah, but, why?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If the Rat King really had everything planned out, then us running into him before couldn't be a coincidence.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He was communicating with us from the start.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's his trap. Why would he want to give us clues? That doesn't make any sense.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I don't know either, maybe we've been too quick to consider him an enemy...? I just have a feeling.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's not just a feeling. After we met the Rat King, he kept trying to hint at something... or something.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mmm... Well, it's better than nothing.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: This is it..?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Looks like it's about 80cm by 40cm, but in an iron box... Yep, this definitely seems like a big gift box to me?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Could- could you explain?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Nope. I don't get it at all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Then we better call up Texas, maybe she and the girls can——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There's not enough time. This looks like it's got a timer on it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So it's a bomb?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So it's a bomb. Pretty cliche. Both in shape and execution.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Right... Mostima, you get out of here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And what are you going to do?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Take a chance.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: This is a custom shield, and my body is pretty tough too. If I play this wrong, I might still survive.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Are you serious?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Then I want to see how this plays out. And don't worry, I might be able to mitigate the damage from the explosion.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's my job, after all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I know. *Inhale*
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: *Exhale* Here I go!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You decided? That wire's the same color as my hair.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Erm! M- Mostima! Don't joke with me please! I'm almost——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It hit zero! Get behind me!!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Okay, okay.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Nnnngg...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Why isn't it hot?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Wait, this is... candy?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Pay attention to how you land. You don't want to break anything.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Not sure, but... Woweee! There's people fallin' from the sky?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ow ow ow, why is this happening again... Agh! S- sorry!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: S'all right. What're you two doin' up there? Playin' trapeze artist?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yowch! Somethin' just hit me?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: ...Candy?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's raining... candy?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ugh, it's that sickly sweet smell in the air again.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I think it's about time we wrapped this up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Hm? Um? Texas, do you know something we don't know?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No. But I have a pretty solid idea.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hey!! If you had a lead, you should've told us!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sauin. It's long over.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...Wanna get dim sum?
attributes.name: Rat King's Henchman

attributes.content: So early? Let's go to the roof and watch the sunrise.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You mafia types are funny. Always with the sunrise on the roof...
attributes.name: Rat King's Henchman

attributes.content: Gah. This candy's smashed into my head so much I think I got brain damage. It's the signal to stop, and I stopped.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: But boy, it's more like we just got beaten on. My whole body's so tender...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: They... they all stopped. What's going on? This doesn't feel right.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We're all done, just like that? These fellers love candy so much?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The candy rain stopped.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Yes, so fleeting. If only it would truly rain candy someday.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So there was the candy...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But wait, what about the bomb?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You mean this?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh? You took the whole thing apart?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Just a minute.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Whoops, lost control there for a second. Hope you didn't get burned.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: This looks like an ordinary metal box?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...And there's one piece of candy inside. Ew, it melted. It's all sticky...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And this note? Is it from the Rat King...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: What does it say?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: 'Happy Sauin'...
attributes.name: Bison
